== Introduction ==

How to run M-Audio Transit USB Sound Card with Ubuntu Studio

== Install ==

The soundcard is supported with Karmic 9.10. Unfortunately the needed package madfuload from the repository is not working. Please install madfuload from https://launchpad.net/~neil-aldur/+archive/ppa.

Installing this version loads the firmware without any problems.
